mapper.select: select board_id as boardId, title as title, view_count as viewCount, user_name as userName, DATE_FORMAT(B.created_at, '%y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as createdDate, DATE_FORMAT(B.modified_at, '%y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as modifiedDate from board B left join user U on B.created_by = U.user_id order by board_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into board (title, content, view_count, created_by, created_at, modified_by, modified_at) values (#{title}, #{content}, 0, #{createdBy}, SYSDATE(), null, null)
